content: We are in the process of fixing the dates for FHIR DevDays 2017 (!). We are aiming for 15-17 November 2017. Is there anyone who knows of some very important conflicting event that might be an obstacle for participants to DevDays? It’s nearly impossible for us to get a global overview of what’s happening.

It's partly overlapping with Medica '17
https://www.gewerbeverzeichnis-deutschland.de/messetermin/medica_2017/Duesseldorf/2017/6121.html
That's also been an issue for this year's date.
@Simone Heckmann thanks. Anyone can send me a private message if there are more conflicting events.
AMIA has been overlapping this year, will be Nov 4-8 in 2017 so good on that front!

Thank you all for responding to the date proposal for DevDays 2017. There are some conflicts, but that's inevitable. We have set the dates for FHIR Developer Days 2017 to 15-17 November 2017. Looking forward to seeing some of you next week on DevDays2016 and all of you on DevDays2017.
